synopsis.p: Disambiguate features that have multiple values.

description.p: evaluates target as a list of elements with the current document as the context element. Then it tries to keep a single value for the feature ambiguousFeature in each item in the result. To achieve this, it keeps a set of unambiguous values found in the document. Unambiguous values are found in elements for which there is a single value for ambiguousFeature.

param-doc.name: warnIfAmbiguous
param-doc.p: Either to issue a warning if an element has still ambiguous values after processing.
